-rwx--x--x  1 root     root           0 Jul  7 09:38 /tmp/foo
     0:owner@:read_data/write_data/append_data/read_xattr/write_xattr/execute
         /read_attributes/write_attributes/read_acl/write_acl/write_owner
         /synchronize:deny
     1:group@:read_xattr/execute/read_attributes/read_acl/synchronize:deny
     2:everyone@:read_xattr/execute/read_attributes/read_acl/synchronize:deny
